data.text: The app is very helpful. I probably look at it once or twice a week. I love the ability to have ordered delivery, order drop off, or pick up options. I like being able to choose a store/location. We probably have been in 8 different stores in 8 year. We love to check out the Sam's club near wherever we may travel. The app location helps us see what is available at that store. I enjoy scan and go too.

I've done pickup orders a number of times and have never had any issues. The entire app worked great until today, when I was unable to "check-in" at the store. The "I'm here" function would only take me to a blank screen. This was before store opening, so I had to flag down an associate who was bringing out another order - about a 20 minute wait. Now, I'm hesitant to use pickups in the future.

As of the last few months, the ability to use the EBT PIN pad on Scan and Go while in-club fails. I am able to "slide to pay" at check out, but when the PIN pad attempts to load, it produces an error message suggesting to update the app. I have updated the app many times, but it still fails. Uninstalling, reinstalling, restaring my phone has all produced no results. Months ago, the PIN pad loaded just fine. For reference, I have a Samsung Galaxy A53 5G. Android OS, of course.

I downloaded the app thinking it would help organize my life and make things simpler but that is a joke. Even when I have the location turned on, it won't allow me to set my club store, the app constantly crashes, nor does it all me to add things to a list that I created. It's simply the worst. Guess I will only be using it as a reminder for when my membership is due for renewal!

Generally love the app, scan and go is very convenient, HOWEVER, rating 2 stars to express my dissatisfaction with the local club delivery service through the app. It is "batch order processing" which translates to "you will never receive the order when you scheduled to receive it and you will not get an updated time of when to expect it." Don't offer a service you can't stick to.

It's fine when it works. The app crashes or gets permanently stuck on the loading screen at times. Today it sat on the loading screen for 20 minutes as the app failed to ever launch. If I was ever given a physical card this would be less of an issue but I couldn't use the fuel station or buy anything with this happening

UPDATED: Easy to use, makes shopping/checking out a breeze. Scan&Go, best thing since apple pie! The ability to order from the Cafe is very helpful and quick, lines are always long in my area, app orders speed it up greatly. A major improvement would be the ability to checkout shipping items seperate from in store checkout items. As it is now, you have to remove everything from cart just to have one item shipped. Walmart app has this ability so I know it's possible. Look forward to this change

Probably the best and most useful app I have used for any shopping. There's an option to scan & pay, easy to shop and place orders, easy to search. The only thing that needs work is "see substitutions" when an item isn't available. You might be looking for substitutions for cookies and be recommended light bulbs and laundry detergent. I try not to eat tide pods, so that makes dieting hard...

Love the Scan and Go feature so I don't have to stand in line. Handy to check prices of they are missing. Sometimes they have special deals and discounts for using the app, which is nice. I love that I can search my receipts (by scan and go and in-store) so I don't need paper copies.i can place orders for pick up, too.

It is very easy to use,scan your items and I learned today you can very easily scan additional items even after you already swiped and paid! You get to save money shopping at Sam's Club and the only line you have to stop for is going out the door for them to check a couple items, just as they do for the others that wait in line to check. you totally skip that part!!

LOVE the convenience of shopping without having to wait in line for a chasier or for self-checkout. Same with the Cafe especially since sometimes the line is extremely long. I place my order for the Cafe before doing my shopping so that it is done when im finished shopping. They even have an option to add more items to your cart after you have made your initial purchase, in case you forgot something. Very useful app. Not sure why others dont use it but glad because it allows me to beat the lines

The app crashes and drains my battery by half. It typically crashes in the scan and go process. However, this happened while scanning the QR code at the gas pump. The android version of this app has been problematic for over a year and a half. The Scan and go feature is phenomenal, as we cannot go back to the dreaded checkout line. Although, it would be awesome if the app worked as it should, without crashing at every scanned item.

Changing my store rarely works. I travel a lot and sometimes need to change my store a couple of times a month. I want to see if my item is available in the nearest store before I go. I do not want it shipped to me. Scan and Go works well. I like the club fine. Store arrangement is good. Fix the store selection on the app and I'll change the rating.

Would be better if I can actually select my local Sam's Club. Why have the feature to search for you club when it doesn't even work? I even found it manually, pressed the search in this area button, and even then I still can't select it, even though IT'S RIGHT THERE. Seems like they really want to get into your settings, since you can't do anything until you allow them all permissions.

For the most part, the app is stable and functional. However there are times it bugs out. Recently, I tried to post a professional-based honest review on a product, then I received a message that basically said it won't do that and lost all the text. It seemed like a bug or perhaps they're rejecting honest reviews. Regardless, it's poor quality.

It offers "continuous scan" EVERY TIME YOU USE THE APP. I have never used "continuous scan", I don't WANT it, yet it asks me EACH AND EVERY TIME. After the 50th time or so it gets rather annoying. There doesn't seem to be an option to say "stop offering continuous scan". I'm a software developer and this is amateur level design and app coding. It's been over a year and "stop asking about continuous scan" is STILL not an option.

Can't set "My Club" because the search doesn't even ATTEMPT to find any. I can zoom into the map to show the Sam's Club and I can't even tap on it. I gave the app PRECISE location and it shows my little dot but doesn't even try to zoom in or anything. I manually zoom and choose search this area and nothing happens. What more do you want from me? Thankfully the website works well enough.

I love that you can pull up information about different Sam's club locations. anything from locations that have gas stations to being able to add and remove items to your cart and quickly check out. it definitely is an incentive to go shopping on crowded days because you can be in and out really quickly. I would definitely recommend having the app.

Feminine products blacklisted from store pickup. I don't know if this is the same across all stores, but if stores blacklist certain items from pickup, I'd rather know upfront and have the pickup option grayed out instead of wasting time trying to add an item to pickup only to find out I can't. I really don't appreciate being gaslit by the Sam's club app.

Usually a great experience on the app but it's completely broken on the Samsung Fold 4. Scan and go doesn't even open when the phone is unfolded. When looking at the specials + offers sections pictures don't load, text appears under buttons, it's hard to buy anything through the app when using the big screen on the fold 4. Please fix

For the most part this app has been a blessing and time saver as far as getting gas and shopping. The scan and go feature is really helpful. However today when I tried to get gas it scanned the pump then the screen went blank. To inconvenience myself I had to go into the store to replace my card only for the pump to show up that I was previously at. If this is an update... it needs to be fixed.

I tried to use the scan and go feature the other night at my sams club. The feature would not accept the items I was trying to scan. It was not reading them and I would get an error. I have used this feature twice before and it worked fine except the app was a little slow inside the location. This was highly annoying to me. I had to wait in a very long line. Pease fix this. It doesn't help anybody if it doesn't work right. Thank you.

When I highlight text in other apps (Chrome, Firefox), the menu that appears offers "search in Sam's Club" as an option along with the usual things like cut, paste, etc. I'll be removing the app until this feature can be disabled. Sam's Club has no legitimate need to insert itself into this process, and it feels very intrusive.

"SEARCH WITH SAM'S CLUB" I'm uninstalling the app and REPORTING it because Sam's Club did not ask for my permission before adding this feature. When highlighting a word in Chrome for example, there is now a line for "Search with Sam's Club." This is invasive and abuses my permissions. The only reason I go to Sam's is because I don't have to go through those long lines, I can scan and go. However, if I can't scan and go, then no point in renewing my membership.

Not working correctly since update. Prior to update I had no issues with pick up or shipping, now it doesn't recognize I've got my address in there and won't even allow me to change everything to pick up. I even uninstalled and reinstalled without success. I was able to order from the website without issue. Just pointless to have an app that doesn't work as intended. Will amend if issues are resolved.

An update forced it to permanently add an option to the long tap context menu in Android making "Search with Sam's club" the default option on top over your system copy and paste options which get relegated to the 3 dot additional menu. It's intrusively annoying as it shows up everywhere, even in other apps when not using the Sam's club app and I can't find any options to disable it without uninstalling the app.

Latest version adds a "search with Sam's club" context menu item whenever you long press in the web browser (like for copy and pasting.) The only way to remove this useless menu item is to uninstall the app (no settings change it.) This should be optional on android's end, but also should not be included on an app like Sam's club. I love scan and go, but I can't put up with this menu item so I am uninstalling now an will not renew my membership due to this issue (unless fixed prior to that time)

Shuts off my phone everytime I scan an item for the scan and go. It doesn't do that with any of my other apps that use the same feature (scanning items for purchase). I tried updating, removing updates, uninstalling and reinstalling, and turning my phone on and off manually. It's the app. Edited to add: It doesn't do it when I use it to get gas, only for items in the store.

Tried purchasing things that were on the one day sale. Before checking out, the price was reflected of the sale. After entering in my payment info to check out, the price changed back to its full price. I had to uninstall the app in order to order from the browser directly. Was able to purchase my items, but because of that delay, one of my items went out of stock!

App is real good, scanning and paying on the phone is awesome. Only complaint is with drive up. I'm the one who always picks up the groceries and hubby never wants to come or is at work. The account being in my husband's name makes this difficult, since they want the person who's name the account is under present. If there was an option to add a pickup person it would be 5 stars. I've had to be turned away for pickup.

The app is User friendly, easy to set up, and saves me time waitimg in line. I can just scan my cart, easily edit items, and check out with a few clicks. This is a huge reason why I transitioned from Costco. I Get some great deals and am in and out quickly. I also like having the option to look things up on my app beforehand and even get my order shipped or ready for pick up.

The only thing decent and reliable is the scan& go feature. Don't trust their inventory and think you can place orders for pick up, they just end up cancelling the order without an explanation, and if they deliver something you can bet it will not be the one you selected specifically (color, size, etc.). Until they get their inventory under control, don't bother to trust it, it lies.

Since Dec. update, app kept crashing, kept getting error messages, no longer showed product images, would not open, was accessible only thru my e-mail, now thru play store? Now, the app no longer responds. I can not open it at all. I have uninstalled and re-installed it at least 7 times. It was the best user-friendly app, a joy to shop with. NOW, if zero stars were an option I'd be all in. Please fix this, as I have no problem with my other apps, or I will be forced to shop elsewhere. Thank you

When scrollong through my frenquently purchased items, it just keeps repeating things, seemingly intermingled with things that I haven't yet seen. Since I had no hope of reaching the end I just stopped. It would be great to see a list of the things I usually and/or frenquently buy with each item only listed once. And for crying out loud, how hard would it be to format this as a text box so the editor could help with spell-check and capitalizations.

Never lets me get gas. App will scan the pump, then it will ask me to enter a credit card. I type in the card number I use and already saved and it just tells me the card is saved but won't select the new information or the saved information. The pump also won't let you scan the app to use the pump. I'm glad that I insisted on a physical membership card, otherwise I'd never be able to shop here.

App is alright, but I have been unable to use the store locator to set my store. Every time I attempt to search the nearby area, or search by zip code, it does nothing but stay on the zoomed out view and does not show any stores near me.

Auto renew can't be turned off in the app, very hostile and not consumer friendly. The change to turn it off in app should be implemented as soon as possible. This practice they're currently doing is anti-consumer.

It's so easy to use I was able to download it halfway through my shopping trip to have access to the scan and Go feature and was able to do that in my shopping and check out in under 25 minutes. it was a lot easier than I expected it to be. It's a very streamlined and user-friendly app.

Whenever I access Sam's Club through Google, it knows who I am and which club I frequent. Whenever I try to search items on the app, it always says to better filter results select a club location. But whenever I try to select a location, nothing loads. Even when I zoom in to the area my club is located and search, still nothing loads. So how then do I select a club???

I like the app! I don't like that if you are a member you still have to pay for pickup and shipping unless you have the best membership I assume then you get it all free otherwise you've gotta go in and shop the app is still great though I've kept it on my phone for years now!

Wish there was a way to cancel the café orders. Also, when you go to fuel, it doesn't let you pay with anything other than the stored cards in the app. Wish it let you scan the QR code at the pump and then pay at the pump with your own physical card. This app is great, but it obviously needs work.

So easy to use. Love the scan and go feature. Love not having to dig for my credit card to get gas or to checkout in the store. It's easy to find what I need and to order stuff from the app. This is one of the few apps that I have no gripes about.

Recently it required a code to login and sent to my email but it never came. Checked spam/junk folder and nothing there. Useless app since I can't login without the code so I can only use it on my computer, not my phone. They need to be able to send the code by text to my phone. Worked with 3 reps on chat to no avail.

I love the Sam's Club App. I use the order online, schedule to pick up the next day. When my scheduled time draws near, I receive a Text that my order is ready. When I arrive at Sam's, I respond to the Text letting them know what # the Pickup spot that I'm in. Within 10, 15 minutes max an Employee comes out and loads my order into my vehicle. Scan & Go is really convenient and easy if you go into the store to get products that you would rather pick out yourself.

Please, please, please make the scan and go feature confirm deleting an item from the cart. As it works now, if anything touches the screen, it starts deleting items. I promise to change my rating and review if you add this simple feature.

Shopping works fine. Scanning works most of the time no real complaints there but the new January 2024 update crashes and flips screens on Travel section. Horrible experience. Very frustrating. Worked fine all the other times I've used it before this update. I force stopped and logged out. Didn't help.

I'm not sure if Sam's club is the best wholesale warehouse club around, but the scan and go app is by far the best mobile app. Fuel, scan and go, help system are all the best in class end this app should be a case study and what to do right. We had a BJ's open close to us but I always go a couple miles further because the Scan and Go feature of the Sam's club app makes it so quick for me to get in and out.

love shopping at Sam's club and the app makes it even easier! the scan and go means skipping the check out lines saving time! Our local Sam's club has the best people working there! super friendly, always happy to help the customers, and always checking on you while you shop!
Usually good but in the last couple weeks I always get stuck on a blue empty screen when I open the app and when trying to scan the QR at the fuel pumps, nothing happens and I can't continue.

I super love the scan and go options as well as the free pick up amd delivery wth their premium membership! also, earning the sams club credit to use on yoir total as it builds up your savings is a great advantage as well !

After the latest update I am no longer able to sign into my account. I sugned up years ago with an old email I no longer have access to but I did have all my Membership info and was able to sign in by using my account number and zip code. It seems that option has been removed and it is a HUGE inconvenience!

Re: the Sam's Club App. With the app I can check my local Sam's Club prices and availability on many items in the Club, then make my Shopping List, all right on the app on my phone ! Then when I'm shopping the Club I like to use Scan & Go, - so easy ! I like that I can shop at Sam's Club ON LINE, as well, through the app. On the app, I can ALSO check my account balance at any time, get monthly statement information, pay the bill, get my credit score, etc. ... All in one app !!!

this app is really good especially when there's lines in each register. I also like the ability to continuously scan your cart so you don't have to go back into the skin every time. you have to be careful though so you don't scan something twice. I use this every time I go into Sam's club.

Club Members! Do not be intimidated by the number of cars waiting to fuel up. The pumps may be 4 deep, but the Sam's Club Associates on duty outside have recently done a great job keeping the pumps moving. They are very different from just a month or so ago. Readily available & paying attention. It has made a huge difference in the "fill up" experience!

this app is so awesome, skip the line it's so easy to do the only change that I would love for them to make is to integrate the Cathay food and the products to go payment method. as of now you have to pay for both separately.

I enjoy using this app when shopping 🛒,and would like to thank the staff for helping me set up my phone 📱 the first few times. I'm a little slow scanning right now but I enjoy this app,it's easy to use and quick to checkout. Everyone with a smartphone or iPhone should have it! I give it a 🔟 !!!

If you shop at this location, use the scan and pay. Or you'll be standing in long checkout lines no matter when you go. Without the ability to scan 'n' go, I would rate this location 2.5-3 stars because of the consistent long lines.
The best intuitive, user-friendly shopping app. The search tool and overall functionality are next level. Brilliant. Makes shopping a breeze. No more standing in slow, long lines.
Pathetic app. It's been over 4 months and I still can't set my "club" location. It shows the map you enter your city or even turn on precise location and nothing happens..

This app is so easy and very convenient. The scan-to-go option is awesome. You don't have to stand in checkout lines. You just scan the barcode on the items you are purchasing and then checkout on the app. Then go to exit door and let the employee scan the code on your phone. All done! You can do curbside also.
We have been long time Costco shoppers, but were unhappy with delivery options so gave Sam's a shot. The scan and go feature is awesome. Also like the option for curbside and same day delivery.

I haven't been able to set my club in the app for the past few months. I enter my location, but no stores pop up. Please fix this issue. I would like to be able to check the availability of items in my club.

What is up with the club locator? Hasn't worked since I became a member. Hasn't worked with the last 9 updates to the app. I wish I could check prices at the club in the app, but this makes it a fun game called guess the price.

Really good app for scan and go and gasoline transactions. I mainly use for placing same day delivery orders. Shipping is also quick. I'm a plus member and enjoy alot of free shipping options. One drawback to the app, can't add forgotten items. Need to add this feature!!

Amazing app!! It is unbelievably convenient to be able to pay for my cart without waiting in line and to pay for gas without fumbling for wallet or cards. I love having my receipts and previous purchases stored for me. The whole app is very well designed and easy to use.

Shop-n-Go at Sam's is the key!! No waiting in line except at the door to leave when you're finished shopping & ringing yourself up! No putting your items down to be rang up to then having to put them in your cart for the 2nd time after cashier rings it up! Our rule when shopping with using S-n-G is *SCAN item as it goes in the CHART! Finish shopping - check items check out with the app by slide to pay. YOU'RE DONE! Let door clerk scan the 3 items at the exit & out the door you go!

One of the best apps around. The scan and go has changed my life. I scan and roll right out of the store. I have noticed that some of the discounts are not always in-app but if scanned in store I'm good.

Love being able to use my Scan N Go and skip the lines. Also there is a great African American female employee at the Manchester MO location (today her hair was in blond braids) who is always so friendly and genuine with every single customer and always has a nice word or two for everyone as they leave.

I'm a vending machine owner/operator. I'm in both Sam's Club & Costco, weekly. As far as technology is concerned, Costco is a dinosaur...their app is awful & they are an inconvenience. The only reason I stay with Costco is for their business center: I can get 64 2oz bags of every kind of chips for my machines. None of those mixed. The day Sam's Club gets in that game, with their super convenience of their app & no fee deliveries, my Costco membership is gone. 100% prefer Sam's Club over Costco.

Apps super easy, convenient. Don't have to wait in long lines. Literally just scan and go. Would 5 stars if my local Sam's would have some kind of router inside the store for better cell service. Not only myself but others walking around and even employees complain of bad cell service inside the store.

Arguably the best store in America and beyond! I love Sam's Club so dearly. You could find everything essential with great quality and affordable price. The app allows you to SCAN N GO skipping the long lines. Pretty handy!

data.userName: Robi Hallford America Where Dreams Come True
data.text: it's Amazing 👏 When you can scan and go at Sam's Club, first of all, it's faster. Second of all, some of the items have lower prices when you use scan and go.. Love it and recommend 🤩

What good is the app if you're unable to set a store. I have tried countless times and ways to set my store and it won't bring up ANY in the US. Use browser with no problem but that defeats having the app.
I love the option to skip the line on busy shopping days by using the app. Sometimes there are discounts for specific items when using scan and go too.
The Sam's Club app eliminates the need to carry a physical card and the Scan & Go feature gets me out the door incredibly fast! I never knew that was possible!
This is a constantly evolving app that meets the varied needs of customers to quickly check out without standing in the lines. Effective, very efficient and highly recommended!

I don't know why people are still waiting in long lines when Sam's offers Scan & Go... it's the BEST! You scan as you load your cart, no need to wait in line, or unpack-repack your cart! You just pay thru app & show your QR code at the exit...Fast, easy & convenient!

Using the Sam's app for scan & go is super easy and you don't have to wait in the grocery line. using the app is even easier when getting fuel. Don't have to scan you membership card or credit card. Just open the app, front page is the fuel, scan the QR code on the pump. Done...

Good in-store experience, orders the wrong quantity when ordering online, such as you order 2 boxes of something and 1 shows up, or you order 1 box of something and you get 2 sometime. I've seen it move quantities to other products in the cart before too. Fix this for 5 stars.
The best and by far the most superior Grocery apps that's out there! Way better than Kroger or anything else! The Sam's club app is easy to use and very user friendly with tons of savings!

The amount of data tracking and network access this app uses when it is not active is actually stupid. If I havent opened the app for a week, it should not be sending thousands of requests an hour to data tracking partners.
Scan and go is convenient. Annoying that the cafe constantly marks whole Pizzas as out of stock although waiting in their long line, it is most certainly in stock.
App barely runs. Can't search for anything, no pictures load. Slow on wifi or data. It is completely unuseable.
Constant problems with every feature on it. Uninstaller and re-downloaded it and it worked for a bit then stopped again. Always something new wrong with it.
I love the scan and go feature. I'm able to check the prices of things and skip the check out line. I've been using the app for a few years and can't think of any issues I've had with it.

This is in regards to the app & new "Digital Membership Card"... At first, I was somewhat skeptical and honestly speaking... not exactly happy about it. However, after using it several times for gas and in-store purchases... I now find myself liking it quite a bit! 🙂 🤷🏽‍♂️ 🙂
One of the best prices around. Sometimes there can be a wait, but other times you can just pull up to the pump! You can scan the QR code with your Sam's app to pay...makes it very convenient!

it was great. no issues but I will suggest that you all open the store on time. I was here on Sunday feb 24th and the stor opened at 10: 08. that. used a line that was wrapped around the building so I went to bjs where there was no line and no waiting. you may also wish to open and hour earlier for your business members.

Self Checkouts became a Big Help to get out of Sam's quicker UNTIL Christmas when EVERYONE was standing in those lines. My quick trips to pick up a 2 items became a 30 minute process--IN LINE! My daughter encouraged me to give "SCAN & GO" a try! So Today, for my 74th B/day, she helped me install The App. We went to "MY SAM'S"; spent some "Fun, Quality Mother/Daughter' time with her teaching me how to buy my Monthly Stuff with SCAN & GO; Pass the checkouts & on to the EXIT checker! Yayyyyy
Great convenience! I appreciate this app every time I go to Sam's Club. Makes things go so much faster when you don't have to wait in a line. (except for the exit!)
Super easy to use, and didn't have to stand in line at register. Definitely recommend scam and go!
Great customer service. On time delivery. Membership plus. Is great to join. The app is wonderful. They have great sushi. Blueberrie muffins. Thank you to all the employees at Sam's club.
I don't know where the payment information is. The app says my account is set for auto renew but the lady of the desk says it's not. She won't put a ticket in to correct this so it's doomed.
the scan & go feature is the best thing. it saves an incredible amount of time when checking out.
Update 2024-01-24: big improvement on usability and not being able to paste password was removed...not that Google Keyboard couldn't overcome it anyway nowadays. Scan and Go feature is a time-saver.

Difficult to manage. When I want three of a product, I want three. I don't appreciate an obtuse app making up my mind for me and limiting me to only one item each time. I have three very large dogs who eat a lot.
be sure to use the scan and go app. Reduced pricing and wait times. easy scanning of any item and makes planned or last minute shopping easy to do. better than door dash or instacart in my opinion.

To renew your membership is crazy! Costco gives you the whole month. Sam's is on the date of your renewal! but this place is so sweet!! the checkout is great better than Costco hands down, and the gas station is GREAT!!! I have both memberships, and i really like Sam's better!!

The app is SO awesome. You can scan as you shop, which is fantastic because it's like having the register person in your cart. And when you're done shopping, just "Slide to Play" and you're on your way! Well done Sam's Club!
Wonderful app! Very easy to use!! I even saved $10 off my first purchase using scan n go!!! It was much faster than waiting in line, get in, get out!!
